definition.p: User interface objects, such as dialogs and toolbars, and features, such as storing and retrieving data from a file, can be invoked in different ways resulting in different behavior. Each test case tries a single behavior. The collection of test cases for a single object or feature is a Test Script.

partsAndFunctions.p: Here are the parts of a Test Case:

tr.td: Preseents a number, name, code name and order of execution.
Lists criteria for the test case to be valid.
A simple task that has a specified outcome.
When testing finds a bug, these patterns show how the bug is to be reported.
